HGE::Input_KeyUp

Tests if a key was released during the last frame. 

bool Input_KeyUp(
  int key
);

Parameters

key
Specifies one of virtual-key codes. For more information see Key codes section.

Return value

If the key was released during the last frame, returns true. Otherwise returns false.

Remarks

Input_KeyUp handles keyboard keys and mouse buttons.

The key states are updated outside user's frame function. So don't use Input_KeyUp in a loop to wait a key to be pressed or released, this will result in system hang up.

Requirements

Header: hge.h
Import library: hge.lib

See also

Input_KeyDown, Input_GetKeyName, Input_GetKey, Input_GetChar, Key codes
